name: Robber Sam
description:
Robber Sam - You have to take on the role of an ordinary man named Sam, who decided to become a robber.

Team up with your partner and tools and hit the road! Break into other people's houses while the owners are sleeping and take out everything that has at least some value, steal things from a toaster to a TV and safes and take them to your warehouse. Don't let yourself be seen or you may draw the attention of the police. The game will definitely appeal to fans of movies about robberies and robberies!
